NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow iLoveGallery to use your camera to take photos of the event.
NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow iLoveGallery to access your photos to choose a cover.
NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Allow iLoveGallery to save taken photos to your gallery.
NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Allow iLoveGallery to use your microphone to record audio in videos.
